channel.title: Won't Equip the Item?
channel.description: I got the Boxingscape source to switch over to it, but I found a big issue with it. I can't equip any items or weapons, besides custom ones. At first I thought it was because the custom's have "Wear" options instead of "Wield," but this isn't the case because Ahrim's has "Wear" options and not "Wield." I have no idea on how to fix this, I could really use some help.

item.title: Won't Equip the Item?
item.dc:creator: @revengr revengr
item.description:
@revengr wrote:

Using Boxingscape Client.

EDIT:
Oh, I figured it out.
I managed to fuck up the cache when I was trying to change the config ints.
I guess I pressed the delete button by accident, which I guess made all the other items go down one ID.

Read full topic

item.title: Won't Equip the Item?
item.dc:creator: @revengr revengr
item.description:
@revengr wrote:

I got the Boxingscape source to switch over to it, but I found a big issue with it.
I can’t equip any items or weapons, besides custom ones.
At first I thought it was because the custom’s have “Wear” options instead of “Wield,” but this isn’t the case because Ahrim’s has “Wear” options and not “Wield.”
I have no idea on how to fix this, I could really use some help.

Read full topic
